MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Maes Y Goron and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.03PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03PM on 5th February 2021.
